features.name: App Shell and Routing
features.description: Core app wrapper and route/layout composition.

features.name: Header Component
features.description: Top navigation/header UI, likely showing auth state and navigation.

features.name: Upload Box
features.description: UI for uploading files; likely integrates with Firebase storage and includes drag-and-drop, progress, and validation.

features.name: Pages
features.description: Route pages for main flows (home, login, signup, error).

features.name: Firebase Context and Provider
features.description: Firebase initialization and React Context provider for auth/storage APIs.

features.name: Custom Hooks
features.description: Utility hooks for scrolling, equality checks, and file conversion.

features.name: Assets
features.description: Static assets including logos and images.

features.name: Build Output (dist)
features.description: Vite production build output used for deployment or preview.

features.name: Tooling and Config
features.description: Project configuration for Vite, Tailwind, PostCSS, and ESLint.
